name: Sins OV Cigar
description:
Extreme melee/gun combat with a focus on player aggressiveness and risk/reward mechanics. Features agile movement and brutal melee combat

Richad Cigar, quadrillionaire and head of the Cigar corporation, has been dealt a military invasion by a rival splinter company organized by a former friend, Tony Robusto. Cigar seeks to capture Robusto himself. In thousands of years, not one normal or healthy person has set foot in this continent dominated by corrupt business.

Also known as Sins Of Cigar.
